nodes.name: Pr
nodes.clashcode:
func_Pr clockcount firecount = res
  where
    res = firecount

nodes.name: Int
nodes.function: lambda x, y, clockcount, firecount: [x[0] + y[0]]
nodes.clashcode:
func_Int x y clockcount firecount = res
  where
    res = x + y

nodes.name: Cr
nodes.clashcode:
func_Cr x clockcount firecount = res
  where
    res = ()
